page.title: 14EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Although unemployment is{high}in Lochans this survey confines itself only to those in employment. Of the 54 persons surveyed just under 1/5 are engaged in farming and similar work ( including 2 blacksmiths ). About 15% (8) are in secondary occupations, 4 in the building industry, 2 in Stranraer creamery, 1 baker and one making clothing all in Stranraer. The remaining ( 36 out of 54 ) are employed in the tertiary sector. Of those 9 are engaged in various transport occupations such as train-driving, ferry crew, taxi-driver, removals and coal delivery. Also included are 3 motor mechanics. Another 9 are purveyors of food - chefs, cooks, waitresses, publican.
